meanings.sent1: After the roller coaster ride, she felt queasiest in her stomach.
meanings.sent2: The medicine made her feel queasiest she had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: The queasiest part of the horror movie was when the monster appeared unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The thought of eating spoiled food made her feel queasiest.
meanings.sent5: The queasiest sensation overwhelmed her as the boat rocked back and forth on the rough sea.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of sickness or nausea
meanings.sent1: The queasiest smell in the kitchen came from the rotten eggs.
meanings.sent2: The bumpy road was the queasiest part of the journey for her.
meanings.sent3: The queasiest dish at the party was the overly spicy chili.
meanings.sent4: The queasiest ride at the amusement park made many people feel sick.
meanings.sent5: The queasiest sight in the room was the moldy bread left on the table.
